biotools.summary: Database of annotated published models is a data resource that allows biologists to store, search and retrieve published mathematical models of biological interests. Models present in this database are annotated and linked to relevant data resources, such as publications, databases of compounds and controlled vocabularies, and this modelling formats can be converted, with some of them being available online to be used directly.

bioschemas.name: BioModels database
